metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45341 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability in CDataMoji of the jwwlib component of LibreCAD 2.2.0-rc3 and older allows an attacker to achieve Remote Code Execution using a crafted JWW document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45341` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1
librecad-data - 2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: eslerm> any jww file would not load

criterions.comment: librecad package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-1ubuntu0.1').
